title: Outsider
overview: In the series Outsider is Sebastian class popular boy - a charming guy and the girlfriend of one of the smart girls. Together with friends and Viktor Tobias bully he often class-thick girl, Maria. One evening drinking Sebastian and his friends get drunk and challenge each other in different dangerous leap. Sebastian is seriously injured and must after his long hospital stay adjust to a new life. Now Sebastian get used to sit in a wheelchair and even learn what it's like to be an outsider in the class. The cast in the miniseries include Jonas Wandschneider, Marie The cargo, Sarah-Sofie Boussnina, Rasmus Botoft, Mia Lyhne and Jonas Schmidt. Charlotte Sachs Bostrup directed "Outsider", which according to the director is a story about being young and different, to find the courage to define themselves and dare to reach for the opportunities and friendships that meet one.
